detailsData.title: Goliath’s might with David’s size
detailsData.content: Financial advantages of a large firm with the close, personal client relationship of a small firm.

detailsData.title: We’re the lawyers other lawyers hire
detailsData.content: Attorneys across the country seek out and trust our firm to help their clients.

detailsData.title: We get results
detailsData.content: From record setting $50 million verdicts to $50,000 policy limit settlements, every penny that can be won, will be won.

detailsData.title: 100% Personal Injury
detailsData.content: We don't practice any other law and dedicate our time entirely to helping personal injury victims.

address: 4828 S College Ave Fort Collins, , Colorado 80525
valueProp: At Metier Law Firm, we understand that facing a personal injury can be overwhelming. Our skilled personal injury lawyers and personal injury attorneys are here to guide you through the process of filing a personal injury claim. Dealing with insurance companies can be challenging, but we are committed to helping you navigate these complexities. Whether it's managing your medical bills or fighting for the compensation you deserve, our team is dedicated to providing strength and support during this difficult time. Trust us to be your advocates and protect your rights every step of the way.

testimonalData.text: I am an actual client of Metier Law Firm. I was stopped at a red light on Hwy 34 in Loveland and was rear ended at speed by an inattentive or distracted driver.
testimonalData.author: Raymond C.

testimonalData.text: My husband and I were blessed to find Metier Law. Phil Chupik, esq. and Monica Cherry communicated with us throughout the entire lawsuit process in a way we understood.
testimonalData.author: Amy D.

testimonalData.text: Phil Chupik and Monica Cherry did a great job helping me. I received a free consultation and everything was explained well along the way.
testimonalData.author: Kristin P.
